Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bracelet
Description: Perfectly polished ring-shaped ivory bracelet.  The craftsmanship of the artisan who gave this ornament a slightly XXX shaped attests to the high degree of quality reached during this time. Ivory was a material particularly appreciated by the Nubians and more accessible than nowadays, as the septentrional limit of the habitat of the elephant was then located to the north of Khartoum.
